forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 67. West southwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after midnight. Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
The afternoon sun can be seen glimmering over Downtown San Francisco, casting a gentle light on the streets below as the temperature crests around a comfortable 67 degrees. A brisk west-southwest wind dances through the area, offering a refreshing element to the day, with gusts that make the air feel even livelier. As the sun descends, hints of patchy drizzle may whisper softly after midnight, suggesting a touch of moisture that could fall, though the chance remains slight.

As daylight dwindles, the vibrant clarity persists, but signs of the encroaching marine layer begin to reveal themselves in the air. A light layer of haze clings near the coastal edges, hinting that evening fog may soon weave its embrace around the city. If you step out now, a light jacket or a cozy sweater would be a wise companion, perfect for fending off the evening chill while allowing your skin to bask in the last traces of sun. Evening walks along the waterfront beckon, where you might find comfort in the tranquility of the bay, perhaps grabbing a seat at a local café to savor a warm drink and watch the world drift by as the golden hues of sunset turn to deeper blues.
